hints.title: Custom mode
hints.content: A custom view has been created and added as one of the available modes
WeekView has a columnHeaderRenderer which adds a custom header to day columns.

hints.title: Custom event renderer in DayView
hints.content: Event content and event icon customized

hints.title: Custom dayCellRenderer in DayView
hints.content: The day CSS has been modified to make it appear as a non-working day

hints.title: Custom dayHeaderRenderer in DayView
hints.content: The day header content is augmented
Month mode has a week renderer which makes a more descriptive week column.
Month mode's CSS has been customized to display event bars with a similar appearance to event blocks in DayView.
It also shows its cell overflow popup centered over the cell instead of below it.
